TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Conference extends Android.Telecom.Conferenceable

Docs.summary: Represents a conference call which can contain any number of Connection objects.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool AddConnection(class Android.Telecom.Connection connection) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the specified connection as a child of this conference.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: The audio state of the conference, describing how its audio is currently being routed by the system. This is null if this Conference does not directly know about its audio state.

Docs.param: The connection time, as measured by SystemClock#elapsedRealtime().
